Package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi

This package contains the interfaces and classes required to build modules.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionFactory
    This interface defines the API for establishing and utilizing connections with other nodes, abstracting the underlying socket usage.
    ConnectionFactory.Connection
    This interface defines the functionality for utilizing a connection with a RemoteNode.
    ConnectionFactory.Connection.EventListener
    A listener for events that may occur with the connection.
    Exclusive<T>
    A tagging interface to identify interfaces that must be loaded once and only once into NCJBot.
    OverlayManager
    An interface for modules that manage the overlay network.
    Watchdog
    This interface defines the functionality required to actively detect node failures.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractModule
    The abstract class that all NCJBot modules must inherit from.

Package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi Description

This package contains the interfaces and classes required to build modules.

Author:
Carter Waxman
